<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadowdancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2067) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 192 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Shadowdancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=77)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15); Expert in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You dedicate yourself to the shadows. Your coloring becomes gray and gloomy, your senses adjust to the darkness, and you can sneak through darkness with ease. You gain [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12). You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks when you are within dim light or darkness.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the shadowdancer archetype.

<title level="2">Shadowdancer Dedication leads to...</title>
[Shadow Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2069), [Shadow Master](/Feats.aspx?ID=2073), [Shadow Sneak Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=2068)
